meanings.definition: To analyze or evaluate a substance to determine its composition or quality.
meanings.sent1: Scientists were assaying the soil samples to understand their mineral content.
meanings.sent2: The jeweler was assaying the gold to confirm its purity.
meanings.sent3: The students had fun assaying different candies to see which one tasted the best.
meanings.sent4: She was assaying the situation carefully, like a detective solving a mystery.
meanings.sent5: The chef was assaying the flavors in the dish, trying to create the perfect balance.

meanings.definition: The act of testing or examining something, especially to determine its value or authenticity.
meanings.sent1: The assaying of the antique vase revealed it was a valuable artifact.
meanings.sent2: The company's assaying of the new product showed promising results.
meanings.sent3: The assaying of the suspect's alibi raised doubts about its truthfulness.
meanings.sent4: The assaying of the signature confirmed it was indeed authentic.
meanings.sent5: The assaying of the diamond ring proved it was of high quality.
